instructions: From any home screen, tap Internet . Tap Menu Tap Settings. Under ADVANCED , tap Privacy . Tap Delete personal data . Select the options to clear: Cache Cookies and site data Browsing history Tap Done .
From any home screen, tap Internet . Tap Menu. Tap New window to open it. To close it, tap the X or in the upper left-hand corner of the window.
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Camera . Tap Settings . Tap Storage location . Select Device or Memory card .
From any home screen, tap Internet . Tap Menu . Tap Settings . Tap Content settings . Tap Default storage . Select Phone or SD card .
From any home screen, tap Internet. Tap Menu > Settings . Under ADVANCED , tap Content settings . Select or clear the Turn on JavaScript checkbox.
